title: Elric  of Melnibone - Eternal Champion
description:
Elric of MelnibonÃƒÂ© is a fictional character created by Michael Moorcock, and the antihero of a series of sword and sorcery stories centering in an alternate Earth. The proper name and title of the character is Elric VIII, 428th Emperor of MelnibonÃƒÂ©. Later novels by Moorcock mark Elric as a facet of the Eternal Champion.

Elric first appeared in print in MoorcockÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s novella, "The Dreaming City" (Science Fantasy #47, June 1961); subsequent novellas were reformatted as the novel Stormbringer (1965), but his first appearance in an original novel wasn't until 1973 in Elric of MelnibonÃƒÂ©. Moorcock's albinistic character is one of the better known in fantasy literature, having crossed over into multimedia, such as comics and film, though efforts towards the latter stalled over the years. The novels have been continuously in print since the 1970s.
